# f5distributedcloud_malicious_user_mitigation (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_malicious_user_mitigation` data source retrieves information about an existing malicious user mitigation configuration.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_malicious_user_mitigation" "example" {
  name      = "my-mitigation"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "enabled" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_malicious_user_mitigation.example.enabled
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the malicious user mitigation to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the malicious user mitigation is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the malicious user mitigation.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the malicious user mitigation is enabled.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the malicious user mitigation.
